scenario.name: Hyperinflation Collapse
scenario.description: US Dollar index drops 20% in 1 week. Oil hits $150.

steps: Detecting anomaly in market data streams...
Analyzing impact of MACRO_SHOCK on portfolio...
Simulating hedging strategies (Long Volatility, Gold, BTC)...
solution.recommended_action: Hedge with OTM Puts and increase Cash position.
